SEARCH:
Package game

Klasse HandCards

java.lang.Object
game.HandCards
public class HandCards extends Object
Represents the hand cards of a player.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • HandCards

      public HandCards()
      Constructs a new HandCards object

  • Methodendetails

    • addCard

      public void addCard(int cardId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a card to the hand cards.
      Parameter:
      cardId - The identifier of the card to be added.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card is already in the hand or the id is invalid.

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(int cardId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a card from the hand cards.
      Parameter:
      cardId - The identifier of the card to be removed.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card is not in the hand or the id is invalid.

    • containsCard

      public boolean containsCard(int cardId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if the handcards contain a specific card.
      Parameter:
      cardId - The identifier of the card to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the card is in hand, false otherwise.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the cardId is invalid.

    • hasHigherValue

      public boolean hasHigherValue(int id1, int id2) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if card 1 has a higher numerical value than card 2, regardless of suit.
      Parameter:
      id1 - The identifier of the first card.
      id2 - The identifier of the second card.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if card 1 has a higher value, false otherwise.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player doesn't have at least one of the selected cards or at least one id is invalid.

    • getHigherId

      public int getHigherId(int id1, int id2) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the identifier of the card with the higher numerical value, regardless of suit.
      Parameter:
      id1 - The identifier of the first card.
      id2 - The identifier of the second card.
      Gibt zurück:
      The identifier of the card with the higher value, or 0 if values are equal.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player doesn't have at least one of the selected cards or the id is invalid.

    • countCardsInRange

      public int countCardsInRange(int startValue, int endValue)
      Counts the number of cards in a specified range.
      Parameter:
      startValue - The starting value of the range.
      endValue - The ending value of the range.
      Gibt zurück:
      The number of cards in the specified range.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the hand cards, setting all values to false.

    • getIsInHandCopy

      public boolean[] getIsInHandCopy()
      Gets a copy of the isInHand array.
      Gibt zurück:
      A copy of the isInHand array.

    • setIsInHandToCopy

      public void setIsInHandToCopy(boolean[] isInHand)
      Sets the isInHand array to a provided copy.
      Parameter:
      isInHand - The copy of the isInHand array to set.

    • getIsInHand

      public boolean[] getIsInHand()
      Gets the isInHand array.
      Gibt zurück:
      The isInHand array.

    • setIsInHand

      public void setIsInHand(boolean[] isInHand)
      Sets the isInHand array to a provided array.
      Parameter:
      isInHand - The array of the isInHand array to set.
